page.title: 12A Holiday at Skegness.
page.content: We went to{Skegness}for our holiday.It took us 3 hours to get there. We went to a caravan site called North Shore Holiday Camp. When we got there my Mum and Dad got the caravan stands down. My Mum got everything sorted out while my sister and I played ball. Then we had dinner. After dinner we went to the beach for a paddle before we went shopping. After tea we had a shower and got changed and went to the amusements. On the day we went home, in the morning we went shopping. We came back and had our dinner, then we went to the beach. We had some crisps and a drink and set off for home. I was sick on the way back.
